dmca.title: Claim of Copyright Infringment
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Kenton McLeod [mailto:kentonmc@guardianmedia.net.au] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2006 3:32 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: Re: FW: Claim of Copyright Infringment

Hello

Just search for the text "Today more and more couples" on the web page
www.rcacdplayer.com. These 5 and the next 286 words are a direct copy of our
page http://www.guardianmedia.net.au/weddings.htm

Thanks
Kenton

> We are unable to locate on the web page www.rcacdplayer.com/ any of 
> the material that you claim is being infringed as of 10:50:32 a.m.
(GMT-6).
>
> Legal Response Team
> ThePlanet.com
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kenton McLeod [mailto:kentonmc@guardianmedia.net.au]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2006 8:26 PM
> To: copyright@theplanet.com
> Subject: Claim of Copyright Infringment
>
> To George Poletes, Corporate Counsel, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, 
> Inc
>
> The copyrighted work at issue is virtually all the text that appears 
> on http://www.guardianmedia.net.au/weddings.htm
>
> Infringing webpages:
> http://www.rcacdplayer.com/
>
> My name is Kenton McLeod,
> My email is kentonmc@guardianmedia.net.au My address is: PO Box 45,
>                 ETTALONG BEACH,
>                 NSW AUSTRALIA 2257
>
> The contact information for the offending website, according to 
> whois.sc, is as follows:
> sam@skc-networks.com
>
> I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials 
> described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized 
> by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
>
> I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code 
> Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is 
> accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on 
> behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
>
>
> Signed: _____________________________
>              /Kenton McLeod/
>              Kenton McLeod
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
